channel.title: RefactorFirst
channel.description: Articles about everything related to smart home. Here we explore what are the various ways we can integrated smart devices to Home Assistant and much more.

item.title: Spring Boot 3 Docker Compose Support
item.description: We will have a look at the new Spring Boot 3.1 feature supporting Docker Compose files on startup. No need to start Docker compose separately again
item.author: (Amrut Prabhu)
